posts.post_content:
I hate to do it but in order to raise some funds for another purchase I'm selling of some of my collection. :(  Please let me know if you see something you like.  I'm willing to negotiate some.  Shipping is $3 no matter how many you buy.  

T205
Frank Corridon Sweet Cap SGC 50 $45 SOLD
Louis Evans Cycle PSA 4.5 $65 SOLD
Arnold Hauser Hassan SGC 50 $45 SOLD
Rebel Oakes Piedmont SGC 50 $45 SOLD

Steve Evans Sweet Cap 350 PSA 4 $50 SOLD
Ed Konetchy Sweet Cap 150 PSA 3.5 $40 SOLD
Eddie Phelps Piedmont 350 SGC 3 $35 SOLD

1949 Bowman #162 Preacher Roe rookie PSA 5 $90
1957 Topps #18 Don Drysdale rookie VG-Ex $45 SOLD

Thanks,
Ron
